means: （古希腊数学家）欧几里得的，欧几里得几何学的

sentence.Network_en: Supervised pattern classifiers with Euclidian Measurement are finally performed for recognition.
sentence.Network_cn: 以欧氏距离作为度量,使用标准模式分类器用于步态识别.

sentence.Network_en: Control - constraint LMI representation is obtained taking account of upper bound on Euclidian 2 - norm of control input.
sentence.Network_cn: 考虑被控对象控制向量2范数上界,得到控制受约束的LMI表述.

sentence.Network_en: We introduce some model to mimic the networks developing on the Euclidian space.
sentence.Network_cn: 提出了确定性连接的演化的网络模型.

PerfectNetExp.abs: A NOTE ON THE BEST EUCLIDIAN FIT TO A GIVEN DISTANCE MATRIX关于距离矩阵的最佳欧氏逼近

means.word_mean: 1. relating to geometry as developed by Euclid;

auth_sentence.content: The physical processes in Universe change all the time so the Euclidian geometry also has to change.
auth_sentence.res_content: The physical processes in Universe change all the time so the Euclidian geometry also has to change.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The physical processes in Universe change all the time so the Euclidian geometry also has to change.

auth_sentence.content: This lead Lobachevsky and Bolyai to discover Non-Euclidian geometry which is not static but elastic.
